alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Kankakee; Kendall; Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 07 at 11:11PM CDT until May 08 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT MONDAY FOR NORTHERN GRUNDY, NORTHEASTERN KANKAKEE, SOUTHERN KENDALL AND SOUTHWESTERN WILL COUNTIES... At 1111 PM CDT, doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rainfall moving out of the area. Light rainfall should continue to diminish over the next few hours. Standing water from earlier rainfall will likely remain for the next few hours. HAZARD...Flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges. IMPACT...Continued flooding of creeks, streams, drainage ditches, streets, underpasses, low-lying areas, and other poor drainage areas. Some locations that may continue to experience flooding include... Lisbon, Morris, Minooka, Wilmington, and Manteno. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
